title: DP Hour 1 - Doug Gottlieb & Ryan Hollins guest hosting
itunes:title: DP Hour 1 - Doug Gottlieb & Ryan Hollins guest hosting
description:
Doug and Ryan, filling in for Dan, discuss the incident Sunday night that resulted in a Mavericks' fan being removed from the game after supposedly putting his hands on Chris Paul's family member.  Doug and Ryan talk about how watchable the Mavs-Suns games are with all of the dramatic reactions to calls and non-calls. Ja Morant hurt his knee in game three, Doug and Ryan discuss how they think he was injured and what it means now that Morant is likely out for game four. 

#DougGottliebShow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
